options.explainDetail: Agent Lv. 1 - 100 skills +1 level (Awakening skills excluded)

options.explain:
When HP reaches 0, casts Hero's Spirit buff, applying the following effects.
- All HP healing effects negated
- Incoming damage consumes MP instead of HP. Character dies if MP reaches 0.
- MP -2% every sec.
options.explainDetail:
When HP reaches 0, casts Hero's Spirit buff, applying the following effects. (Cooldown: 300 sec.)
- All HP healing effects negated
- Incoming damage consumes MP instead of HP. Character dies if MP reaches 0.
- MP -2% every sec.

options.explain:
Attack Speed +5% and Casting Speed +7.5%
Skill MP cost +50%
Skill Atk. +5% and All Elemental Damage +20 while consuming MP instead of HP for incoming damage

options.explain:
Lv. 40 skills increase Lv. 40 skills' cooldown recovery +15% when cast.
- Lv. 40 skills resets this effect at the max stacks when cast.
- Creator: Effect only applied to the Protection skills

Lv. 75 skills increase Lv. 75 skills' cooldown recovery +15% when cast.
- Lv. 75 skills resets this effect at the max stacks when cast.
- Creator: Effect only applied to the Tuning skills
options.explainDetail:

- Lv. 75 skills resets this effect at the max stacks when cast.
- Creator: Effect only applied to the Tuning skills

options.explain:
Applies the following effects, depending on the total grade value by your equipped weapons, armor, accessories, and Special Equipment.
- 800%+: Movement Speed +5%
- 900%+: Attack Speed +5% and Casting Speed +7.5%
- 1,000%+: Physical/Magical Critical +5%
- 1,080%+: Skill Atk. +5%
options.explainDetail:
Applies the following effects, depending on the total grade value by your equipped weapons, armor, accessories, and Special Equipment. (Titles and sub weapons excluded)
- 800%+: Movement Speed +5%
- 900%+: Attack Speed +5% and Casting Speed +7.5%
- 1,000%+: Physical/Magical Critical +5%
- 1,080%+: Skill Atk. +5%

options.explain:
Applies the following effects, depending on its equipment grade value while equipped.
- Below 85%: Damage Value +1198
- 85% to below 90%: Damage Value +3194
- 90%+: Damage Value +9581
options.explainDetail:
Applies the following effects, depending on its equipment grade value while equipped.
- Below 85%: Damage Value +1198
- 85% to below 90%: Damage Value +3194
- 90%+: Damage Value +9581

options.explain:
Applies the following effects, depending on the number of your hatched Creatures. (Eggs don't count.)
- 3 - 9: Damage Value +3992
- 10+: Damage Value +6786
options.explainDetail:
Applies the following effects, depending on the number of your hatched Creatures. (Equipped Creatures included. Eggs don't count.)
- 3 - 9: Damage Value +3992
- 10+: Damage Value +6786

options.explain: If you have at least 20 hatched Creatures, then this applies Spectrum, all speeds +15%, Skill Atk. +7%, and skill cooldown -8% (Eggs don't count.)
options.explainDetail: If you have at least 20 hatched Creatures, then this applies Spectrum, all speeds +15%, Skill Atk. +7%, and skill cooldown -8% (Awakening skills excluded. Only 1 Spectrum effect applied. Equipped Creatures included. Eggs don't count.)
